mapper.sql: bundledtlid, bundleid, regionid, type, objtype, objid, createtime
mapper.select: select * from medialist where '${objtype}' = '1' and medialistid = '${medialistid}'
select * from text where '${objtype}' = '2' and textid = '${textid}'
select * from stream where '${objtype}' = '3' and streamid = '${streamid}'
select * from dvb where '${objtype}' = '4' and dvbid = '${dvbid}'
select * from widget where '${objtype}' = '5' and widgetid = '${widgetid}'
select * from bundledtl where bundleid = '${bundleid}' order by bundledtlid
select * from bundledtl where bundleid = '${bundleid}' and regionid = '${regionid}'
mapper.delete: delete bd from bundledtl bd, bundle b, layoutdtl ld where ld.layoutdtlid = '${layoutdtlid}' and ld.layoutid = b.layoutid and ld.regionid = bd.regionid and b.bundleid = bd.bundleid
mapper.update: update bundledtl set objid = 0 where objtype = '${objtype}' and objid = '${objid}'
mapper.insert:
insert into bundledtl(bundleid, objtype, objid, regionid, type) values
(#{item.bundleid}, #{item.objtype}, #{item.objid}, #{item.regionid}, #{item.type})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bundledtl (bundleid, regionid, type, objtype, objid, createtime) values (#{bundleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bundledtl
bundleid,
regionid,
type,
objtype,
objid,
createtime,

mapper.update:
update bundledtl
bundleid = #{bundleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
objtype = #{objtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
objid = #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where bundledtlid = #{bundledtlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bundledtl set bundleid = #{bundleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regionid = #{regionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, objtype = #{objtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, objid = #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where bundledtlid = #{bundledtlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
